name: Democracy Droid!
tagline: This (free as in speech) application streams and downloads Democracy Now! The war and peace report.
body: # Free Democracy Now! for Android This application streams, either in audio or video, the independent media broadcast Democracy Now! The War and Peace Report. Find it on the google PlayStore. ##Democracy Now?!? Democracy Now! is a national, daily, independent, award-winning news program hosted by journalists Amy Goodman and Juan Gonzalez. Pioneering the largest public media collaboration in the U.S. ##Disclaimer The episodes are licensed under Creative Commons, Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs 3.0 United States. I have no affiliation with Democracy Now! Find v.1.5.1 on the Play Store ## License - Democracy Droid GPLv3 - SimplisticRss library Apache 2 - [ShirwaM](https://github.com/ShirwaM/Simplistic-RSS) - Picasso Apache 2 - http://square.github.io/picasso/ - Democracy Now! CC BY-NC-ND 3.0 US - Jsoup MIT ## Bugs - When swiping through tabs, feeds duplicate - When scrolling up, headers get squished and blended - Must restart to effect settings change ## TODO - Blog reading activity - (More) Parse Downloaded File Label - Days since field - settings - No Images - Notifications - Default stream audio/video - feeds - Add download button - Delete/see progress of downloads
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
